price: Akasema Firauni: Ikiwa umekuja na Ishara, basi ilete ukiwa ni katika wasemao kweli.
arabic: قَالَ إِن كُنتَ جِئۡتَ بِـَٔايَةٖ فَأۡتِ بِهَآ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ
footnotes: Firauni akamwambia Musa: Ikiwa umekuja na Ishara (muujiza) kutokana na huyo aliye kutuma, basi nionyeshe kama wewe ni katika watu wakweli wanalo lishika neno la haki.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla in kunta ji'ta biāyatin fati bihā in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
